abstract.text: Convert between linear PCM audio formats, and between linear PCM and compressed formats.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Audio converter objects convert between various linear PCM audio formats. They can also convert between linear PCM and compressed formats. Supported transformations include the following:
PCM floating point to and from PCM integer
PCM interleaved to and from PCM deinterleaved
PCM to and from compressed formats
A single audio converter may perform more than one of the listed transformations.

abstract.text: Record or play audio, convert formats, parse audio streams, and configure your audio session.
